pageSetting.title: 机构等级评定查询

attribute.value: select djpdmc as key,djpdmc as value from djpd_djbz where f_numtochar(pdnf) = substr(f_numtochar($pdrq$),1,4) and khdx='1'

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select djpd_yyjg_jg.tjrq pdrq, khdx_jg.jgdh, khdx_jg.jgmc, jglb.lbmc jglb, dmms.dmms khzq, djpd_yyjg_jg.pm, djpd_yyjg_jg.jbmc dj, djpd_yyjg_jg.jbmc djmc, djpd_yyjg_jg.jlbz, djpd_yyjg_jg.ms from djpd_yyjg_jg djpd_yyjg_jg inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.khdxdh=djpd_yyjg_jg.khdxdh inner join csb_dmms dmms on upper(dmms.dmmc) = 'DJPDZQ' and dmms.dmz = djpd_yyjg_jg.pdzq inner join khdx_jglb jglb on djpd_yyjg_jg.khdxdh=jglb.khdxdh and djpd_yyjg_jg.tjrq between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qx($pdrq$, $login_khdxdh$, 0)) qx on qx.khdxdh = khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and djpd_yyjg_jg.tjrq= $pdrq$ and khdx_jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and djpd_yyjg_jg.djpdmc = '$djpdmc$' order by djpd_yyjg_jg.pm asc

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select djpd_yyjg_jg.tjrq pdrq, khdx_jg.jgdh, khdx_jg.jgmc, jglb.lbmc jglb, dmms.dmms khzq, djpd_yyjg_jg.pm, djpd_yyjg_jg.jbmc dj, djpd_yyjg_jg.jbmc djmc, djpd_yyjg_jg.jlbz, djpd_yyjg_jg.ms from djpd_yyjg_jg djpd_yyjg_jg inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.khdxdh=djpd_yyjg_jg.khdxdh inner join csb_dmms dmms on upper(dmms.dmmc) = 'DJPDZQ' and dmms.dmz = djpd_yyjg_jg.pdzq inner join khdx_jglb jglb on djpd_yyjg_jg.khdxdh=jglb.khdxdh and djpd_yyjg_jg.tjrq between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qx($pdrq$, $login_khdxdh$, 0)) qx on qx.khdxdh = khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and djpd_yyjg_jg.tjrq= $pdrq$ and khdx_jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and djpd_yyjg_jg.djpdmc = '$djpdmc$' order by djpd_yyjg_jg.pm asc ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select djpdmc as key,djpdmc as value from djpd_djbz where f_numtochar(pdnf) = substr(f_numtochar($pdrq$),1,4) and khdx='1'
